hero.title: Create Custom QR Codes
hero.description: Generate unique and stylish QR codes in just a few clicks. Customize colors, add your logo, and download in your preferred format.

legal.title: Legal Notice
legal.hostAddress: 2325 3rd Street, Suite 296, San Francisco, CA 94107, United States

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: Qr2code does not collect any personally identifiable data. No information is stored or shared. The service is limited to generating and downloading QR codes directly in your browser.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.description: This site uses only strictly necessary cookies for your session to function. No third-party cookies or analytical trackers are placed.

rights.title: Your rights
rights.description: You have the right to access, rectify and delete your data. Since no personal data is collected, these rights have no practical application.

privacy.contact: For any questions, contact me at
